name: Kingdra
author: Naoyo Kimura
flavor_text: It lives in caves on the seafloor and creates giant whirlpools every time it moves.

attacks.name: Dragon Vortex
attacks.effect: Does 20 damage times the number of {W} Energy cards and {L} Energy cards in your discard pile. Then, shuffle all of those cards back into your deck.

attacks.name: Tri Bullet
attacks.effect: This attack does 30 damage to 3 of your opponent’s Pokémon. (Don’t apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)
